=== Ubuntu, The Middle East, Spring 2012 ===

Precise is in Beta 2.

<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/unity/+bug/654988 | Unity and Nux's support of RTL is in the works]]</nowiki> and not yet released.

That means RTL users get an LTR Unity interface when their hardware allows Unity.

In order to prevent widespread chaos, a temporary solution would make a <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/unity/+bug/963682 | fallback from Unity to Unity 2D for RTL locales]]</nowiki>.

This must be done before precise is released in order to provide a reasonable experience for RTL users in Ubuntu precise.
